trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged> event is raised when the user clicks the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> navigation controls to display the next or previous month.
For a list of initial property values for an instance of MonthChangedEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MonthChangedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MonthChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MonthChangedEventArgs>.
|Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |`NewDate`|`newDate`| |`PreviousDate`|`previousDate`|
The date that determines the month currently displayed by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>.
The date that determines the month previously displayed by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>.
Gets the date that determines the currently displayed month in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
Use this property to get the month currently displayed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control and to compare the currently displayed month with another month.
For example, you can use this property to calculate the number of months until or since a certain date.
This date is normally the first date of the currently displayed month; however, it can be programmatically changed to any date within the month.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleDate%2A> property can be assigned to this property programmatically to override the month change when the user clicks the navigation controls for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
The date that determines the month currently displayed by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>.
Gets the date that determines the previously displayed month in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
Use this property to determine the previously displayed month on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.

You can restore the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control to the previously displayed month by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleDate%2A> property to PreviousDate.
This date is normally the first date of the previously displayed month; however, it can be programmatically changed to any date within the month.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleDate%2A> property is updated to the date in this property before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged> event is raised.
The date that determines the month previously displayed by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>.
